analysis.description:
Reentrancy in HC8ICO.fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0xd9153cfdfb5ec8f82c5e647deb379b10d402d7e4.sol#617-635):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(msg.sender,tokens.total) (/unique_chucks/10/0xd9153cfdfb5ec8f82c5e647deb379b10d402d7e4.sol#622-625)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(tokens.change) (/unique_chucks/10/0xd9153cfdfb5ec8f82c5e647deb379b10d402d7e4.sol#627-630)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSoldTotal (/unique_chucks/10/0xd9153cfdfb5ec8f82c5e647deb379b10d402d7e4.sol#631-632)
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0xd9153cfdfb5ec8f82c5e647deb379b10d402d7e4.sol#631-632)

HC8ICO.finishICO (/unique_chucks/10/0xd9153cfdfb5ec8f82c5e647deb379b10d402d7e4.sol#767-783) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- capIsReached = (totalSupply == tokensCap)

HC8ICO.finishICO (/unique_chucks/10/0xd9153cfdfb5ec8f82c5e647deb379b10d402d7e4.sol#767-783) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- capIsReached = (totalSupply == tokensCap)
HC8ICO.isReachedLimit (/unique_chucks/10/0xd9153cfdfb5ec8f82c5e647deb379b10d402d7e4.sol#674-678) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensCap.sub(totalSupply) == 0
